Global search

r2dii.data: Datasets to Align Financial Markets with Climate Goals

? ald_demo An asset level dataset for demonstration
? co2_intensity_scenario_demo A prepared co2 intensity climate scenario dataset for demonstration
? data_dictionary Column definitions of all datasets
? isic_classification Dataset to bridge (translate) common sector-classification codes
? iso_codes Countries and codes
? loanbook_demo A loanbook dataset for demonstration
? nace_classification Dataset to bridge (translate) common sector-classification codes
? naics_classification Dataset to bridge (translate) common sector-classification codes
? overwrite_demo A demonstration dataset used to overwrite specific entity names or sectors
? region_isos A dataset outlining various region definitions
? region_isos_demo A dataset outlining various region definitions
? scenario_demo_2020 A prepared climate scenario dataset for demonstration
? sector_classifications A view of available sector classification datasets

r2dii.match: Tools to Match Financial Portfolios with Climate Data

? match_name Match a loanbook and asset-level datasets (ald) by the name_* columns
? prioritize Pick rows where â€˜scoreâ€™ is 1 and â€˜levelâ€™ per loan is of highest â€˜priorityâ€™
? prioritize_level Arrange unique â€˜levelâ€™ values in default order of â€˜priorityâ€™

r2dii.analysis: Tools to Calculate Climate Targets for Financial Portfolios

? join_ald_scenario Join a data-loanbook object to the ald and scenario
? summarize_weighted_production Summarize production based on the weight of each loan per sector per year
? target_market_share Add targets for production, using the market share approach
? target_sda Add targets for CO2 emissions per unit production at the portfolio level, using the SDA approach
